00028 #include "FixedDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModelCellsGenerator.hpp"
00029 
00030 
00031 template<unsigned DIM>
00032 AbstractCellCycleModel* FixedDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModelCellsGenerator<DIM>::CreateCellCycleModel()
00033 {
00034     return new FixedDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModel();
00035 }
00036 
00037 
00038 template<unsigned DIM>
00039 double FixedDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModelCellsGenerator<DIM>::GetTypicalTransitCellCycleTime()
00040 {
00041     return TissueConfig::Instance()->GetTransitCellG1Duration()
00042             + TissueConfig::Instance()->GetSG2MDuration();
00043 }
00044 
00045 
00046 template<unsigned DIM>
00047 double FixedDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModelCellsGenerator<DIM>::GetTypicalStemCellCycleTime()
00048 {
00049     return TissueConfig::Instance()->GetStemCellG1Duration()
00050             + TissueConfig::Instance()->GetSG2MDuration();
00051 }
00052 
00053 
00054 template<unsigned DIM>
00055 bool FixedDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModelCellsGenerator<DIM>::CellsCanDifferentiate()
00056 {
00057     return true;
00058 }
00059 
00060 
00061 template<unsigned DIM>
00062 void FixedDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModelCellsGenerator<DIM>::GenerateGivenLocationIndices(std::vector<TissueCell>& rCells,
00063                                                                           const std::vector<unsigned> locationIndices)
00064 {
00065     assert(!locationIndices.empty());
00066 
00067     unsigned num_cells = locationIndices.size();
00068 
00069     rCells.clear();
00070     rCells.reserve(num_cells);
00071 
00072     for (unsigned i=0; i<num_cells; i++)
00073     {
00074         AbstractCellCycleModel *p_cell_cycle_model = CreateCellCycleModel();
00075         TissueCell cell(STEM, HEALTHY, p_cell_cycle_model);
00076         double birth_time = 0.0 - locationIndices[i];
00077         cell.SetBirthTime(birth_time);
00078         rCells.push_back(cell);
00079     }
00080 }
00081

00087 template class FixedDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModelCellsGenerator<1>;
00088 template class FixedDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModelCellsGenerator<2>;
00089 template class FixedDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModelCellsGenerator<3>;
